name: The CUBE Arena (KomodoRexGAMES)
description:
This is my first unity game. THE CUBE ARENA  The Cube Arena is a fun physics game where you have to knock the other player off the map, you can choose from 2 different maps. CONTROLS WASD - Move Player 1 (Green) IJKL - Move Player 2 (Gold)

Sorry if this game is not the best it is my first unity game
